marketing information:
See more, do more! The DoubleSight DS-220WA is perfect for Office or Home use. The DS2200WA Dual Monitor Solution is a uniquely designed multiple LCD display solution which can increase user productivity as much as 50% by allowing the user to view and manage several sources of information or programs simultaneously without switching between windows.
Built with the latest LED Back Light Technology, the DS-2200WA will provide sharp, bright colors for years to come The DS-2200WA is Energy Star Compliant and comes with a 3 Year Warranty. Like all DoubleSight Products, this Monitor Solution is fully TAA Compliant.
The DS-2200WA Dual Monitor is an All-in-One turnkey solution providing 2 High Resolution Monitors, 1 Dual Monitor Flex Desktop Stand and all of the cabling needed. All required components are preassembled and ship in one box which saves time and money.
